dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-pip

dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.
dependencies.name: py-setuptools

dependencies.description: A Spack managed Python virtual environment
dependencies.name: python-venv

dependent_to.description:
CodePy is a C metaprogramming toolkit for Python. It handles two aspects
of metaprogramming: - Generating C source code. - Compiling this source
code and dynamically loading it into the Python interpreter.
dependent_to.name: py-codepy

dependent_to.description:
data distribution geared toward scientific datasets. DataLad makes data
management and data distribution more accessible. To do that, it stands
on the shoulders of Git and Git-annex to deliver a decentralized system
for data exchange. This includes automated ingestion of data from online
portals and exposing it in readily usable form as Git(-annex)
repositories, so-called datasets. The actual data storage and permission
management, however, remains with the original data providers.
dependent_to.name: py-datalad

dependent_to.description:
This software implements the metadata model that datalad and datalad-
metalad will use in the future (datalad-metalad>=0.3.0) to handle
metadata.
dependent_to.name: py-datalad-metadata-model

dependent_to.description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.
dependent_to.name: py-dvc

dependent_to.description:
Python script to download global terrain digital elevation models, SRTM
30m DEM and SRTM 90m DEM.
dependent_to.name: py-elevation

dependent_to.description: Python's filesystem abstraction layer
dependent_to.name: py-fs

dependent_to.description: Tool to convert geopandas vector data into rasterized xarray data.
dependent_to.name: py-geocube

dependent_to.description: Parser tools for Mozilla's Glean telemetry.
dependent_to.name: py-glean-parser

dependent_to.description: HTTP-based REST interface to Stan, a package for Bayesian inference.
dependent_to.name: py-httpstan

dependent_to.description: Wavelet scattering transforms in Python with GPU acceleration.
dependent_to.name: py-kymatio

dependent_to.description: Dock matplotlib figures and other widgets.
dependent_to.name: py-mpldock

dependent_to.description: Scripts to download genomes from the NCBI FTP servers
dependent_to.name: py-ncbi-genome-download

dependent_to.description: PennyLane is a Python quantum machine learning library by Xanadu Inc.
dependent_to.name: py-pennylane

dependent_to.description:
Pooch manages your Python library's sample data files: it automatically
downloads and stores them in a local directory, with support for
versioning and corruption checks.
dependent_to.name: py-pooch

dependent_to.description:
PyCUDA gives you easy, Pythonic access to Nvidia's CUDA parallel
computation API
dependent_to.name: py-pycuda

dependent_to.description:
Pyomo is a Python-based open-source software package that supports a
diverse set of optimization capabilities for formulating and analyzing
optimization models.
dependent_to.name: py-pyomo

dependent_to.description: Python wrapper for OpenCL.
dependent_to.name: py-pyopencl

dependent_to.description:
Headless chrome/chromium automation library (unofficial port of
puppeteer).
dependent_to.name: py-pyppeteer

dependent_to.description: A collection of tools for Python
dependent_to.name: py-pytools

dependent_to.description: Easier Pythonic interface to VTK.
dependent_to.name: py-pyvista

dependent_to.description:
A persistent HTTP cache that provides an easy way to get better
performance with the python requests library.
dependent_to.name: py-requests-cache

dependent_to.description: A pure Python Lex/Yacc that works with RPython.
dependent_to.name: py-rply

dependent_to.description: Simplified packaging for pybind11-based C++ extensions
dependent_to.name: py-setuptools-cpp

dependent_to.description:
An adaptation of the popular mkdocs-material theme for the Sphinx
documentation tool.
dependent_to.name: py-sphinx-immaterial

dependent_to.description: virtualenv is a tool to create isolated Python environments.
dependent_to.name: py-virtualenv

dependent_to.description: A tool for visualizing and tracking your machine learning experiments.
dependent_to.name: py-wandb

dependent_to.description:
The Xanadu Cloud Client (XCC) is a Python API and CLI for the Xanadu
Cloud.
dependent_to.name: py-xanadu-cloud-client

dependent_to.description:
Workflow management system to create reproducible and scalable data
analyses.
dependent_to.name: snakemake

description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".
name: py-appdirs

variants.description: Build systems supported by the package
variants.name: build_system
